name: Vilnius Old Town Exploration
description: Wander through the historic streets of Vilnius Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its medieval architecture.

name: Trakai Island Castle Visit
description: Explore the picturesque Trakai Island Castle, located on an island in Lake GalvÄ—.

name: Curonian Spit National Park
description: Discover the unique natural beauty of the Curonian Spit, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its sand dunes and rich wildlife.

name: Hill of Crosses Pilgrimage
description: Visit the Hill of Crosses, a site of pilgrimage and a symbol of Lithuanian Catholicism and resilience.

name: Kaunas Old Town
description: Stroll through the historic Old Town of Kaunas, rich in architectural and cultural heritage.

name: Aukstaitija National Park
description: Explore Aukstaitija National Park, known for its lakes, forests, and traditional villages.

name: Druskininkai Spa Town
description: Relax in Druskininkai, a renowned spa town famous for its mineral springs and wellness facilities.

name: Kernave Archaeological Site
description: Discover the Kernave Archaeological Site, a UNESCO World Heritage site representing early medieval Baltic history.

name: Palanga Amber Museum
description: Visit the Palanga Amber Museum, showcasing a wide collection of amber pieces and inclusions.

name: Nida Beaches and Dunes
description: Enjoy the serene beaches and impressive dunes of Nida, a charming town on the Curonian Spit.
